events.comment: Assign each dream to a grim
Return Dreams to kids and delete the Grim that stole the Dream

parameters: sound effect\sound effect\giving dreams to the kid.mp3
sound effect\sound effect\pixie bomb sound Short.mp3
sound effect\sound effect\pixie bomb sound Short.mp3

events.comment: The Grim Movement, chase after the their stolen dream
Grim stun from PixieBomb. Wakes them up and lose their dream if they were sleeping
Change to wasd from  default arrow controls in TopDownMovement
Grim steals back the dream and heads to their sleeping location
Grim take back the dream if the player fails to take it

parameters: sound effect\sound effect\picking up pixie dust bags.mp3

events.comment: Moving Walls Up Down ( Change the value of MovementFromOrigin and MovementTime to get a result )
Moving Walls Left Right ( Change the value of MovementFromOrigin and MovementTime to get a result )
Condition Wall/Door, For now only if player has 1 dream

parameters: "Poor kid... a grim took his dream..."
"Let's not waste anymore time, use WASD keys to move."
"Yeah that's how much time you have until the kids miss school."
"Use Space to dash. Dashing uses Pixie Dust Energy."
"I leave behind a pixie bomb that will stun grims for a bit and make them drop the dream."
"Pixie dust bags help replenish your Pixie dust energy more quickly."
"That's the Grim! he's sleeping right now."
"Walk up to it and dash to stun it and then pick up the dream."
"Then run back to the kid, once you get the dream to him the grim will... dissapear."
"We did it! The kid can sleep easy tonight"
"But alot more kids have had their dream stolen."

events.comment: Play sound when text pops up and changes.
